openbanking.fetchRecordAlreadyAuth: SELECT * FROM CETRX.OWGT_AUTH WHERE C_MAIN_REF = '${customerRefNumber}' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${C_UNIT_CODE}' AND I_EVENT_TIMES = '${I_EVENT_TIMES}'
openbanking.updatetrxgapisys: UPDATE CETRX.TRX_GAPI_ASYNC SET C_GAPI_SEND_STATUS = 'R' WHERE C_MAIN_REF = '${customerRefNumber}' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${C_UNIT_CODE}' AND I_EVENT_TIMES = '${I_EVENT_TIMES}'
openbanking.getNextAuthorizeList: SELECT DISTINCT B.C_USER_ID,B.I_AUTH_LEVEL,A.C_TRX_STATUS,A.C_TRX_ID,B.C_UNIT_CODE FROM CETRX.TRX_AUTH_LIST A,CEUSER.SEC_USER_INFO B WHERE A.C_UNIT_CODE = B.C_UNIT_CODE AND A.C_UNIT_CODE = '${C_UNIT_CODE}' AND B.I_AUTH_LEVEL IS NOT NULL AND A.C_USER_ID IN ('1','0') and A.C_TRX_STATUS = 'T' and A.I_AUTH_LEVEL=B.I_AUTH_LEVEL and A.C_TRX_ID = (SELECT C_TRX_ID FROM CETRX.TRX_INBOX WHERE C_MAIN_REF = '${customerRefNumber}' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${C_UNIT_CODE}' AND I_EVENT_TIMES = '${I_EVENT_TIMES}' AND C_BK_GROUP_ID = '${C_BK_GROUP_ID}') GROUP BY B.C_USER_ID,B.I_AUTH_LEVEL,A.C_TRX_STATUS,A.C_TRX_ID,B.C_UNIT_CODE
openbanking.getUnSendOBRecord: SELECT * FROM CETRX.TRX_OB_STP WHERE SEND_FLAG IS NULL
